UTGP solicits T-shirt designs from all over the world. This year the theme is Peanuts, in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the birth of Charles M. Schulz, the creator of this famous comic strip. Works by 11 artists who won a fierce competition will come to the UT collection!

The skater girl motif taps into the flourishing skateboard scene. A cool, simple composition featuring Lucy as a skater girl combined with a distinctive font.

©2022 Peanuts Worldwide LLC

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith Haring

Andy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Haring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring's iconic works on UT.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.

PEANUTS × Reyn Spooner

Sunbaked in the spirit of Aloha, Reyn Spooner has been crafting quality Aloha Shirts for over 65 years. Founded on the beach of Waikiki, Reyn Spooner is known globally for their original Aloha prints and exceptional products. For this print, Reyn Spooner’s talented artists have taken Charles M. Schulz’s original characters and infused some Aloha as Charlie Brown and the Peanuts gang can be seen enjoying Hawaii.

©2022 Peanuts Worldwide LLC
©2022 reynspooner

items.shortDescription: Infused with the spirit of Aloha, a collaboration with Reyn Spooner and PEANUTS is now available in the UT collection.

items.longDescription:
Lisa Larson

Lisa Larson's warm touch and humorous, cute animal motifs, much loved by fans around the world, are now incorporated into these new designs in calm and gentle colors.

Lisa Larson
Lisa Larson is a Swedish ceramist with many fans worldwide. Larson joined Gustavsberg Factory, a leading Swedish ceramic manufacturer, where for over twenty years, she worked as a designer, producing several hundred pieces of work. In 1980, Larson left Gustavsberg Factory to work independently. In 1992, she established Keramikstudion Gustavsberg, where she continues to create new works to this day.

© Lisa & Johanna Larson

- 100% cotton fabric with a smooth, cool feel.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Lisa Larson

Lisa Larson's warm touch and humorous, cute animal motifs, much loved by fans around the world, are now incorporated into these new designs in calm and gentle colors.

Lisa Larson
Lisa Larson is a Swedish ceramist with many fans worldwide. Larson joined Gustavsberg Factory, a leading Swedish ceramic manufacturer, where for over twenty years, she worked as a designer, producing several hundred pieces of work. In 1980, Larson left Gustavsberg Factory to work independently. In 1992, she established Keramikstudion Gustavsberg, where she continues to create new works to this day.

© Lisa & Johanna Larson

- 100% cotton fabric with a smooth, cool feel.
- Straight cut.
- Convenient pockets.
- 10cm longer in-seam for more practical and versatile design.
items.name: Lisa Larson Relaco 3/4 Shorts
items.shortDescription: Lisa Larson is a popular Scandinavian artist. Some of her adorable animals are back in Uniqlo this season.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Pokémon Meets Artist SS22

Since its creation in 1996, Pokémon has been loved by people worldwide. This collection features the participation of “magma,” a new artist duo attracting attention worldwide. Their creativity has produced a collection full of new Pokémon charm and appeal!

artist unit: magma
An artist unit by Jun Sugiyama and Kenichi Miyazawa. They use their unique outlook to create works with waste materials, resin, and motor appliances, and have expanded into furniture, products, and space direction. They are garnering much attention both domestically and abroad for their vaguely nostalgic works that fuse analogue and crazy colors.

©2022 Pokémon.
©1995-2022 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
